mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lp_role ( id, open_id, pwd, avatar_url, role_code, nick_name, telephone, gender, city, country, province, create_time, modify_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{openId}, #{pwd}, #{avatarUrl}, #{roleCode}, #{nickName}, #{telephone}, #{gender}, #{city}, #{country}, #{province}, now(), #{modifyTime} );
mapper.update:
UPDATE lp_role
pwd = #{pwd},
avatar_url = #{avatarUrl},
role_code = #{roleCode},
nick_name = #{nickName},
telephone = #{telephone},
gender = #{gender},
city = #{city},
country = #{country},
province = #{province},
modify_time = now()
WHERE open_id = #{openId};
mapper.select: select lpr.id as id, lpr.open_id as openId, lpr.pwd as pwd, lpr.avatar_url as avatarUrl, lpr.role_code as roleCode, lpr.nick_name as nickName, lpr.telephone as telephone, lpr.gender as gender, lpr.city as city, lpr.country as country, lpr.province as province from lp_role lpr where lpr.open_id = #{openId}

select lpr.id as id, lpr.open_id as openId, lpr.pwd as pwd, lpr.avatar_url as avatarUrl, lpr.role_code as roleCode, lpr.nick_name as nickName, lpr.telephone as telephone, lpr.gender as gender, lpr.city as city, lpr.country as country, lpr.province as province from lp_role lpr where 1=1
